24#include "tinyxml2.h"

26#include <new> // yes, this one new style header, is in the Android SDK.
27# ifdef ANDROID_NDK
28# include <stddef.h>
29#else
30# include <cstddef>

33static const char LINE_FEED = (char)0x0a; // all line endings are normalized to LF
34static const char LF = LINE_FEED;
35static const char CARRIAGE_RETURN = (char)0x0d; // CR gets filtered out
36static const char CR = CARRIAGE_RETURN;
37static const char SINGLE_QUOTE = '\'';
38static const char DOUBLE_QUOTE = '\"';
39
40// Bunch of unicode info at:
41// http://www.unicode.org/faq/utf_bom.html
42// ef bb bf (Microsoft "lead bytes") - designates UTF-8
43
44static const unsigned char TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0 = 0xefU;
45static const unsigned char TIXML_UTF_LEAD_1 = 0xbbU;
46static const unsigned char TIXML_UTF_LEAD_2 = 0xbfU;
47
48
49#define DELETE_NODE( node ) { \
50 if ( node ) { \
51 MemPool* pool = node->_memPool; \
52 node->~XMLNode(); \
53 pool->Free( node ); \
54 } \
55 }
56#define DELETE_ATTRIBUTE( attrib ) { \
57 if ( attrib ) { \
58 MemPool* pool = attrib->_memPool; \
59 attrib->~XMLAttribute(); \
60 pool->Free( attrib ); \
61 } \
62 }
63
64namespace tinyxml2
65{
66
67struct Entity {
68 const char* pattern;
69 int length;
70 char value;
71};
72
73static const int NUM_ENTITIES = 5;
74static const Entity entities[NUM_ENTITIES] = {
75 { "quot", 4, DOUBLE_QUOTE },
76 { "amp", 3, '&' },
77 { "apos", 4, SINGLE_QUOTE },
78 { "lt", 2, '<' },
79 { "gt", 2, '>' }
80};
81
82
83StrPair::~StrPair()
84{
85 Reset();
86}
87
88
89void StrPair::Reset()
90{
91 if ( _flags & NEEDS_DELETE ) {
92 delete [] _start;
93 }
94 _flags = 0;
95 _start = 0;
96 _end = 0;
97}
98
99
100void StrPair::SetStr( const char* str, int flags )
101{
102 Reset();
103 size_t len = strlen( str );
104 _start = new char[ len+1 ];
105 memcpy( _start, str, len+1 );
106 _end = _start + len;
107 _flags = flags | NEEDS_DELETE;
108}
109
110
111char* StrPair::ParseText( char* p, const char* endTag, int strFlags )
112{
113 TIXMLASSERT( endTag && *endTag );
114
115 char* start = p;
116 char endChar = *endTag;
117 size_t length = strlen( endTag );
118
119 // Inner loop of text parsing.
120 while ( *p ) {
121 if ( *p == endChar && strncmp( p, endTag, length ) == 0 ) {
122 Set( start, p, strFlags );
123 return p + length;
124 }
125 ++p;
126 }
127 return 0;
128}
129
130
131char* StrPair::ParseName( char* p )
132{
133 char* start = p;
134
135 if ( !start || !(*start) ) {
136 return 0;
137 }
138
139 while( *p && ( p == start ? XMLUtil::IsNameStartChar( *p ) : XMLUtil::IsNameChar( *p ) )) {
140 ++p;
141 }
142
143 if ( p > start ) {
144 Set( start, p, 0 );
145 return p;
146 }
147 return 0;
148}
149
150
151void StrPair::CollapseWhitespace()
152{
153 // Adjusting _start would cause undefined behavior on delete[]
154 TIXMLASSERT( ( _flags & NEEDS_DELETE ) == 0 );
155 // Trim leading space.
156 _start = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( _start );
157
158 if ( _start && *_start ) {
159 char* p = _start; // the read pointer
160 char* q = _start; // the write pointer
161
162 while( *p ) {
163 if ( XMLUtil::IsWhiteSpace( *p )) {
164 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
165 if ( *p == 0 ) {
166 break; // don't write to q; this trims the trailing space.
167 }
168 *q = ' ';
169 ++q;
170 }
171 *q = *p;
172 ++q;
173 ++p;
174 }
175 *q = 0;
176 }
177}
178
179
180const char* StrPair::GetStr()
181{
182 if ( _flags & NEEDS_FLUSH ) {
183 *_end = 0;
184 _flags ^= NEEDS_FLUSH;
185
186 if ( _flags ) {
187 char* p = _start; // the read pointer
188 char* q = _start; // the write pointer
189
190 while( p < _end ) {
191 if ( (_flags & NEEDS_NEWLINE_NORMALIZATION) && *p == CR ) {
192 // CR-LF pair becomes LF
193 // CR alone becomes LF
194 // LF-CR becomes LF
195 if ( *(p+1) == LF ) {
196 p += 2;
197 }
198 else {
199 ++p;
200 }
201 *q++ = LF;
202 }
203 else if ( (_flags & NEEDS_NEWLINE_NORMALIZATION) && *p == LF ) {
204 if ( *(p+1) == CR ) {
205 p += 2;
206 }
207 else {
208 ++p;
209 }
210 *q++ = LF;
211 }
212 else if ( (_flags & NEEDS_ENTITY_PROCESSING) && *p == '&' ) {
213 // Entities handled by tinyXML2:
214 // - special entities in the entity table [in/out]
215 // - numeric character reference [in]
216 // &#20013; or &#x4e2d;
217
218 if ( *(p+1) == '#' ) {
219 const int buflen = 10;
220 char buf[buflen] = { 0 };
221 int len = 0;
222 p = const_cast<char*>( XMLUtil::GetCharacterRef( p, buf, &len ) );
223 TIXMLASSERT( 0 <= len && len <= buflen );
224 TIXMLASSERT( q + len <= p );
225 memcpy( q, buf, len );
226 q += len;
227 }
228 else {
229 int i=0;
230 for(; i<NUM_ENTITIES; ++i ) {
231 if ( strncmp( p+1, entities[i].pattern, entities[i].length ) == 0
232 && *(p+entities[i].length+1) == ';' ) {
233 // Found an entity convert;
234 *q = entities[i].value;
235 ++q;
236 p += entities[i].length + 2;
237 break;
238 }
239 }
240 if ( i == NUM_ENTITIES ) {
241 // fixme: treat as error?
242 ++p;
243 ++q;
244 }
245 }
246 }
247 else {
248 *q = *p;
249 ++p;
250 ++q;
251 }
252 }
253 *q = 0;
254 }
255 // The loop below has plenty going on, and this
256 // is a less useful mode. Break it out.
257 if ( _flags & COLLAPSE_WHITESPACE ) {
258 CollapseWhitespace();
259 }
260 _flags = (_flags & NEEDS_DELETE);
261 }
262 return _start;
263}
264

267
268// --------- XMLUtil ----------- //
269
270const char* XMLUtil::ReadBOM( const char* p, bool* bom )
271{
272 *bom = false;
273 const unsigned char* pu = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(p);
274 // Check for BOM:
275 if ( *(pu+0) == TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0
276 && *(pu+1) == TIXML_UTF_LEAD_1
277 && *(pu+2) == TIXML_UTF_LEAD_2 ) {
278 *bom = true;
279 p += 3;
280 }
281 return p;
282}
283
284
285void XMLUtil::ConvertUTF32ToUTF8( unsigned long input, char* output, int* length )
286{
287 const unsigned long BYTE_MASK = 0xBF;
288 const unsigned long BYTE_MARK = 0x80;
289 const unsigned long FIRST_BYTE_MARK[7] = { 0x00, 0x00, 0xC0, 0xE0, 0xF0, 0xF8, 0xFC };
290
291 if (input < 0x80) {
292 *length = 1;
293 }
294 else if ( input < 0x800 ) {
295 *length = 2;
296 }
297 else if ( input < 0x10000 ) {
298 *length = 3;
299 }
300 else if ( input < 0x200000 ) {
301 *length = 4;
302 }
303 else {
304 *length = 0; // This code won't covert this correctly anyway.
305 return;
306 }
307
308 output += *length;
309
310 // Scary scary fall throughs.
311 switch (*length) {
312 case 4:
313 --output;
314 *output = (char)((input | BYTE_MARK) & BYTE_MASK);
315 input >>= 6;
316 case 3:
317 --output;
318 *output = (char)((input | BYTE_MARK) & BYTE_MASK);
319 input >>= 6;
320 case 2:
321 --output;
322 *output = (char)((input | BYTE_MARK) & BYTE_MASK);
323 input >>= 6;
324 case 1:
325 --output;
326 *output = (char)(input | FIRST_BYTE_MARK[*length]);
327 default:
328 break;
329 }
330}
331
332
333const char* XMLUtil::GetCharacterRef( const char* p, char* value, int* length )
334{
335 // Presume an entity, and pull it out.
336 *length = 0;
337
338 if ( *(p+1) == '#' && *(p+2) ) {
339 unsigned long ucs = 0;
340 ptrdiff_t delta = 0;
341 unsigned mult = 1;
342
343 if ( *(p+2) == 'x' ) {
344 // Hexadecimal.
345 if ( !*(p+3) ) {
346 return 0;
347 }
348
349 const char* q = p+3;
350 q = strchr( q, ';' );
351
352 if ( !q || !*q ) {
353 return 0;
354 }
355
356 delta = q-p;
357 --q;
358
359 while ( *q != 'x' ) {
360 if ( *q >= '0' && *q <= '9' ) {
361 ucs += mult * (*q - '0');
362 }
363 else if ( *q >= 'a' && *q <= 'f' ) {
364 ucs += mult * (*q - 'a' + 10);
365 }
366 else if ( *q >= 'A' && *q <= 'F' ) {
367 ucs += mult * (*q - 'A' + 10 );
368 }
369 else {
370 return 0;
371 }
372 mult *= 16;
373 --q;
374 }
375 }
376 else {
377 // Decimal.
378 if ( !*(p+2) ) {
379 return 0;
380 }
381
382 const char* q = p+2;
383 q = strchr( q, ';' );
384
385 if ( !q || !*q ) {
386 return 0;
387 }
388
389 delta = q-p;
390 --q;
391
392 while ( *q != '#' ) {
393 if ( *q >= '0' && *q <= '9' ) {
394 ucs += mult * (*q - '0');
395 }
396 else {
397 return 0;
398 }
399 mult *= 10;
400 --q;
401 }
402 }
403 // convert the UCS to UTF-8
404 ConvertUTF32ToUTF8( ucs, value, length );
405 return p + delta + 1;
406 }
407 return p+1;
408}

410
411void XMLUtil::ToStr( int v, char* buffer, int bufferSize )
412{
413 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buffer, bufferSize, "%d", v );
414}
415
416
417void XMLUtil::ToStr( unsigned v, char* buffer, int bufferSize )
418{
419 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buffer, bufferSize, "%u", v );
420}
421
422
423void XMLUtil::ToStr( bool v, char* buffer, int bufferSize )
424{
425 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buffer, bufferSize, "%d", v ? 1 : 0 );
426}
427
428/*
429 ToStr() of a number is a very tricky topic.
430 https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2/issues/106
431*/
432void XMLUtil::ToStr( float v, char* buffer, int bufferSize )
433{
434 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buffer, bufferSize, "%.8g", v );
435}
436
437
438void XMLUtil::ToStr( double v, char* buffer, int bufferSize )
439{
440 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buffer, bufferSize, "%.17g", v );
441}
442
443
444bool XMLUtil::ToInt( const char* str, int* value )
445{
446 if ( TIXML_SSCANF( str, "%d", value ) == 1 ) {
447 return true;
448 }
449 return false;
450}
451
452bool XMLUtil::ToUnsigned( const char* str, unsigned *value )
453{
454 if ( TIXML_SSCANF( str, "%u", value ) == 1 ) {
455 return true;
456 }
457 return false;
458}
459
460bool XMLUtil::ToBool( const char* str, bool* value )
461{
462 int ival = 0;
463 if ( ToInt( str, &ival )) {
464 *value = (ival==0) ? false : true;
465 return true;
466 }
467 if ( StringEqual( str, "true" ) ) {
468 *value = true;
469 return true;
470 }
471 else if ( StringEqual( str, "false" ) ) {
472 *value = false;
473 return true;
474 }
475 return false;
476}
477
478
479bool XMLUtil::ToFloat( const char* str, float* value )
480{
481 if ( TIXML_SSCANF( str, "%f", value ) == 1 ) {
482 return true;
483 }
484 return false;
485}
486
487bool XMLUtil::ToDouble( const char* str, double* value )
488{
489 if ( TIXML_SSCANF( str, "%lf", value ) == 1 ) {
490 return true;
491 }
492 return false;
493}
494
495
496char* XMLDocument::Identify( char* p, XMLNode** node )
497{
498 XMLNode* returnNode = 0;
499 char* start = p;
500 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
501 if( !p || !*p ) {
502 return p;
503 }
504
505 // What is this thing?
506 // These strings define the matching patters:
507 static const char* xmlHeader = { "<?" };
508 static const char* commentHeader = { "<!--" };
509 static const char* dtdHeader = { "<!" };
510 static const char* cdataHeader = { "<![CDATA[" };
511 static const char* elementHeader = { "<" }; // and a header for everything else; check last.
512
513 static const int xmlHeaderLen = 2;
514 static const int commentHeaderLen = 4;
515 static const int dtdHeaderLen = 2;
516 static const int cdataHeaderLen = 9;
517 static const int elementHeaderLen = 1;
518
519#if defined(_MSC_VER)
520#pragma warning ( push )
521#pragma warning ( disable : 4127 )
522#endif
523 TIXMLASSERT( sizeof( XMLComment ) == sizeof( XMLUnknown ) ); // use same memory pool
524 TIXMLASSERT( sizeof( XMLComment ) == sizeof( XMLDeclaration ) ); // use same memory pool
525#if defined(_MSC_VER)
526#pragma warning (pop)
527#endif
528 if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( p, xmlHeader, xmlHeaderLen ) ) {
529 returnNode = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLDeclaration( this );
530 returnNode->_memPool = &_commentPool;
531 p += xmlHeaderLen;
532 }
533 else if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( p, commentHeader, commentHeaderLen ) ) {
534 returnNode = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLComment( this );
535 returnNode->_memPool = &_commentPool;
536 p += commentHeaderLen;
537 }
538 else if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( p, cdataHeader, cdataHeaderLen ) ) {
539 XMLText* text = new (_textPool.Alloc()) XMLText( this );
540 returnNode = text;
541 returnNode->_memPool = &_textPool;
542 p += cdataHeaderLen;
543 text->SetCData( true );
544 }
545 else if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( p, dtdHeader, dtdHeaderLen ) ) {
546 returnNode = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLUnknown( this );
547 returnNode->_memPool = &_commentPool;
548 p += dtdHeaderLen;
549 }
550 else if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( p, elementHeader, elementHeaderLen ) ) {
551 returnNode = new (_elementPool.Alloc()) XMLElement( this );
552 returnNode->_memPool = &_elementPool;
553 p += elementHeaderLen;
554 }
555 else {
556 returnNode = new (_textPool.Alloc()) XMLText( this );
557 returnNode->_memPool = &_textPool;
558 p = start; // Back it up, all the text counts.
559 }
560
561 *node = returnNode;
562 return p;
563}
564
565
566bool XMLDocument::Accept( XMLVisitor* visitor ) const
567{
568 if ( visitor->VisitEnter( *this ) ) {
569 for ( const XMLNode* node=FirstChild(); node; node=node->NextSibling() ) {
570 if ( !node->Accept( visitor ) ) {
571 break;
572 }
573 }
574 }
575 return visitor->VisitExit( *this );
576}
577
578
579// --------- XMLNode ----------- //
580
581XMLNode::XMLNode( XMLDocument* doc ) :
582 _document( doc ),
583 _parent( 0 ),
584 _firstChild( 0 ), _lastChild( 0 ),
585 _prev( 0 ), _next( 0 ),
586 _memPool( 0 )
587{
588}
589
590
591XMLNode::~XMLNode()
592{
593 DeleteChildren();
594 if ( _parent ) {
595 _parent->Unlink( this );
596 }
597}
598
599const char* XMLNode::Value() const
600{
601 return _value.GetStr();
602}
603
604void XMLNode::SetValue( const char* str, bool staticMem )
605{
606 if ( staticMem ) {
607 _value.SetInternedStr( str );
608 }
609 else {
610 _value.SetStr( str );
611 }
612}
613
614
615void XMLNode::DeleteChildren()
616{
617 while( _firstChild ) {
618 XMLNode* node = _firstChild;
619 Unlink( node );
620
621 DELETE_NODE( node );
622 }
623 _firstChild = _lastChild = 0;
624}
625
626
627void XMLNode::Unlink( XMLNode* child )
628{
629 if ( child == _firstChild ) {
630 _firstChild = _firstChild->_next;
631 }
632 if ( child == _lastChild ) {
633 _lastChild = _lastChild->_prev;
634 }
635
636 if ( child->_prev ) {
637 child->_prev->_next = child->_next;
638 }
639 if ( child->_next ) {
640 child->_next->_prev = child->_prev;
641 }
642 child->_parent = 0;
643}
644
645
646void XMLNode::DeleteChild( XMLNode* node )
647{
648 TIXMLASSERT( node->_parent == this );
649 DELETE_NODE( node );
650}
651
652
653XMLNode* XMLNode::InsertEndChild( XMLNode* addThis )
654{
655 if (addThis->_document != _document)
656 return 0;
657
658 if (addThis->_parent)
659 addThis->_parent->Unlink( addThis );
660 else
661 addThis->_memPool->SetTracked();
662
663 if ( _lastChild ) {
664 TIXMLASSERT( _firstChild );
665 TIXMLASSERT( _lastChild->_next == 0 );
666 _lastChild->_next = addThis;
667 addThis->_prev = _lastChild;
668 _lastChild = addThis;
669
670 addThis->_next = 0;
671 }
672 else {
673 TIXMLASSERT( _firstChild == 0 );
674 _firstChild = _lastChild = addThis;
675
676 addThis->_prev = 0;
677 addThis->_next = 0;
678 }
679 addThis->_parent = this;
680 return addThis;
681}
682
683
684XMLNode* XMLNode::InsertFirstChild( XMLNode* addThis )
685{
686 if (addThis->_document != _document)
687 return 0;
688
689 if (addThis->_parent)
690 addThis->_parent->Unlink( addThis );
691 else
692 addThis->_memPool->SetTracked();
693
694 if ( _firstChild ) {
695 TIXMLASSERT( _lastChild );
696 TIXMLASSERT( _firstChild->_prev == 0 );
697
698 _firstChild->_prev = addThis;
699 addThis->_next = _firstChild;
700 _firstChild = addThis;
701
702 addThis->_prev = 0;
703 }
704 else {
705 TIXMLASSERT( _lastChild == 0 );
706 _firstChild = _lastChild = addThis;
707
708 addThis->_prev = 0;
709 addThis->_next = 0;
710 }
711 addThis->_parent = this;
712 return addThis;
713}
714
715
716XMLNode* XMLNode::InsertAfterChild( XMLNode* afterThis, XMLNode* addThis )
717{
718 if (addThis->_document != _document)
719 return 0;
720
721 TIXMLASSERT( afterThis->_parent == this );
722
723 if ( afterThis->_parent != this ) {
724 return 0;
725 }
726
727 if ( afterThis->_next == 0 ) {
728 // The last node or the only node.
729 return InsertEndChild( addThis );
730 }
731 if (addThis->_parent)
732 addThis->_parent->Unlink( addThis );
733 else
734 addThis->_memPool->SetTracked();
735 addThis->_prev = afterThis;
736 addThis->_next = afterThis->_next;
737 afterThis->_next->_prev = addThis;
738 afterThis->_next = addThis;
739 addThis->_parent = this;
740 return addThis;
741}
742
743
744
745
746const XMLElement* XMLNode::FirstChildElement( const char* value ) const
747{
748 for( XMLNode* node=_firstChild; node; node=node->_next ) {
749 XMLElement* element = node->ToElement();
750 if ( element ) {
751 if ( !value || XMLUtil::StringEqual( element->Name(), value ) ) {
752 return element;
753 }
754 }
755 }
756 return 0;
757}
758
759
760const XMLElement* XMLNode::LastChildElement( const char* value ) const
761{
762 for( XMLNode* node=_lastChild; node; node=node->_prev ) {
763 XMLElement* element = node->ToElement();
764 if ( element ) {
765 if ( !value || XMLUtil::StringEqual( element->Name(), value ) ) {
766 return element;
767 }
768 }
769 }
770 return 0;
771}
772
773
774const XMLElement* XMLNode::NextSiblingElement( const char* value ) const
775{
776 for( XMLNode* node=this->_next; node; node = node->_next ) {
777 const XMLElement* element = node->ToElement();
778 if ( element
779 && (!value || XMLUtil::StringEqual( value, node->Value() ))) {
780 return element;
781 }
782 }
783 return 0;
784}
785
786
787const XMLElement* XMLNode::PreviousSiblingElement( const char* value ) const
788{
789 for( XMLNode* node=_prev; node; node = node->_prev ) {
790 const XMLElement* element = node->ToElement();
791 if ( element
792 && (!value || XMLUtil::StringEqual( value, node->Value() ))) {
793 return element;
794 }
795 }
796 return 0;
797}
798
799
800char* XMLNode::ParseDeep( char* p, StrPair* parentEnd )
801{
802 // This is a recursive method, but thinking about it "at the current level"
803 // it is a pretty simple flat list:
804 // <foo/>
805 // <!-- comment -->
806 //
807 // With a special case:
808 // <foo>
809 // </foo>
810 // <!-- comment -->
811 //
812 // Where the closing element (/foo) *must* be the next thing after the opening
813 // element, and the names must match. BUT the tricky bit is that the closing
814 // element will be read by the child.
815 //
816 // 'endTag' is the end tag for this node, it is returned by a call to a child.
817 // 'parentEnd' is the end tag for the parent, which is filled in and returned.
818
819 while( p && *p ) {
820 XMLNode* node = 0;
821
822 p = _document->Identify( p, &node );
823 if ( p == 0 || node == 0 ) {
824 break;
825 }
826
827 StrPair endTag;
828 p = node->ParseDeep( p, &endTag );
829 if ( !p ) {
830 DELETE_NODE( node );
831 node = 0;
832 if ( !_document->Error() ) {
833 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING, 0, 0 );
834 }
835 break;
836 }
837
838 XMLElement* ele = node->ToElement();
839 // We read the end tag. Return it to the parent.
840 if ( ele && ele->ClosingType() == XMLElement::CLOSING ) {
841 if ( parentEnd ) {
842 *parentEnd = static_cast<XMLElement*>(node)->_value;
843 }
844 node->_memPool->SetTracked(); // created and then immediately deleted.
845 DELETE_NODE( node );
846 return p;
847 }
848
849 // Handle an end tag returned to this level.
850 // And handle a bunch of annoying errors.
851 if ( ele ) {
852 if ( endTag.Empty() && ele->ClosingType() == XMLElement::OPEN ) {
853 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_MISMATCHED_ELEMENT, node->Value(), 0 );
854 p = 0;
855 }
856 else if ( !endTag.Empty() && ele->ClosingType() != XMLElement::OPEN ) {
857 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_MISMATCHED_ELEMENT, node->Value(), 0 );
858 p = 0;
859 }
860 else if ( !endTag.Empty() ) {
861 if ( !XMLUtil::StringEqual( endTag.GetStr(), node->Value() )) {
862 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_MISMATCHED_ELEMENT, node->Value(), 0 );
863 p = 0;
864 }
865 }
866 }
867 if ( p == 0 ) {
868 DELETE_NODE( node );
869 node = 0;
870 }
871 if ( node ) {
872 this->InsertEndChild( node );
873 }
874 }
875 return 0;
876}
877
878// --------- XMLText ---------- //
879char* XMLText::ParseDeep( char* p, StrPair* )
880{
881 const char* start = p;
882 if ( this->CData() ) {
883 p = _value.ParseText( p, "]]>", StrPair::NEEDS_NEWLINE_NORMALIZATION );
884 if ( !p ) {
885 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING_CDATA, start, 0 );
886 }
887 return p;
888 }
889 else {
890 int flags = _document->ProcessEntities() ? StrPair::TEXT_ELEMENT : StrPair::TEXT_ELEMENT_LEAVE_ENTITIES;
891 if ( _document->WhitespaceMode() == COLLAPSE_WHITESPACE ) {
892 flags |= StrPair::COLLAPSE_WHITESPACE;
893 }
894
895 p = _value.ParseText( p, "<", flags );
896 if ( !p ) {
897 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING_TEXT, start, 0 );
898 }
899 if ( p && *p ) {
900 return p-1;
901 }
902 }
903 return 0;
904}
905
906
907XMLNode* XMLText::ShallowClone( XMLDocument* doc ) const
908{
909 if ( !doc ) {
910 doc = _document;
911 }
912 XMLText* text = doc->NewText( Value() ); // fixme: this will always allocate memory. Intern?
913 text->SetCData( this->CData() );
914 return text;
915}
916
917
918bool XMLText::ShallowEqual( const XMLNode* compare ) const
919{
920 return ( compare->ToText() && XMLUtil::StringEqual( compare->ToText()->Value(), Value() ));
921}
922
923
924bool XMLText::Accept( XMLVisitor* visitor ) const
925{
926 return visitor->Visit( *this );
927}
928

1072// --------- XMLAttribute ---------- //
1073
1074const char* XMLAttribute::Name() const
1075{
1076 return _name.GetStr();
1077}
1078
1079const char* XMLAttribute::Value() const
1080{
1081 return _value.GetStr();
1082}
1083
1084char* XMLAttribute::ParseDeep( char* p, bool processEntities )
1085{
1086 // Parse using the name rules: bug fix, was using ParseText before
1087 p = _name.ParseName( p );
1088 if ( !p || !*p ) {
1089 return 0;
1090 }
1091
1092 // Skip white space before =
1093 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1094 if ( !p || *p != '=' ) {
1095 return 0;
1096 }
1097
1098 ++p; // move up to opening quote
1099 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1100 if ( *p != '\"' && *p != '\'' ) {
1101 return 0;
1102 }
1103
1104 char endTag[2] = { *p, 0 };
1105 ++p; // move past opening quote
1106
1107 p = _value.ParseText( p, endTag, processEntities ? StrPair::ATTRIBUTE_VALUE : StrPair::ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_LEAVE_ENTITIES );
1108 return p;
1109}

1207// --------- XMLElement ---------- //
1208XMLElement::XMLElement( XMLDocument* doc ) : XMLNode( doc ),
1209 _closingType( 0 ),
1210 _rootAttribute( 0 )
1211{
1212}
1213
1214
1215XMLElement::~XMLElement()
1216{
1217 while( _rootAttribute ) {
1218 XMLAttribute* next = _rootAttribute->_next;
1219 DELETE_ATTRIBUTE( _rootAttribute );
1220 _rootAttribute = next;
1221 }
1222}
1223
1224
1225XMLAttribute* XMLElement::FindAttribute( const char* name )
1226{
1227 XMLAttribute* a = 0;
1228 for( a=_rootAttribute; a; a = a->_next ) {
1229 if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( a->Name(), name ) ) {
1230 return a;
1231 }
1232 }
1233 return 0;
1234}
1235
1236
1237const XMLAttribute* XMLElement::FindAttribute( const char* name ) const
1238{
1239 XMLAttribute* a = 0;
1240 for( a=_rootAttribute; a; a = a->_next ) {
1241 if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( a->Name(), name ) ) {
1242 return a;
1243 }
1244 }
1245 return 0;
1246}
1247
1248
1249const char* XMLElement::Attribute( const char* name, const char* value ) const
1250{
1251 const XMLAttribute* a = FindAttribute( name );
1252 if ( !a ) {
1253 return 0;
1254 }
1255 if ( !value || XMLUtil::StringEqual( a->Value(), value )) {
1256 return a->Value();
1257 }
1258 return 0;
1259}

1263{

1265 return FirstChild()->ToText()->Value();
1266 }
1267 return 0;
1268}

1272{

1274 FirstChild()->SetValue( inText );
1275 else {
1276 XMLText* theText = GetDocument()->NewText( inText );
1277 InsertFirstChild( theText );
1278 }
1279}

1385
1386
1387
1388XMLAttribute* XMLElement::FindOrCreateAttribute( const char* name )
1389{
1390 XMLAttribute* last = 0;
1391 XMLAttribute* attrib = 0;
1392 for( attrib = _rootAttribute;
1393 attrib;
1394 last = attrib, attrib = attrib->_next ) {
1395 if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( attrib->Name(), name ) ) {
1396 break;
1397 }
1398 }
1399 if ( !attrib ) {
1400 attrib = new (_document->_attributePool.Alloc() ) XMLAttribute();
1401 attrib->_memPool = &_document->_attributePool;
1402 if ( last ) {
1403 last->_next = attrib;
1404 }
1405 else {
1406 _rootAttribute = attrib;
1407 }
1408 attrib->SetName( name );
1409 attrib->_memPool->SetTracked(); // always created and linked.
1410 }
1411 return attrib;
1412}
1413
1414
1415void XMLElement::DeleteAttribute( const char* name )
1416{
1417 XMLAttribute* prev = 0;
1418 for( XMLAttribute* a=_rootAttribute; a; a=a->_next ) {
1419 if ( XMLUtil::StringEqual( name, a->Name() ) ) {
1420 if ( prev ) {
1421 prev->_next = a->_next;
1422 }
1423 else {
1424 _rootAttribute = a->_next;
1425 }
1426 DELETE_ATTRIBUTE( a );
1427 break;
1428 }
1429 prev = a;
1430 }
1431}
1432
1433
1434char* XMLElement::ParseAttributes( char* p )
1435{
1436 const char* start = p;
1437 XMLAttribute* prevAttribute = 0;
1438
1439 // Read the attributes.
1440 while( p ) {
1441 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1442 if ( !p || !(*p) ) {
1443 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING_ELEMENT, start, Name() );
1444 return 0;
1445 }
1446
1447 // attribute.
1448 if (XMLUtil::IsNameStartChar( *p ) ) {
1449 XMLAttribute* attrib = new (_document->_attributePool.Alloc() ) XMLAttribute();
1450 attrib->_memPool = &_document->_attributePool;
1451 attrib->_memPool->SetTracked();
1452
1453 p = attrib->ParseDeep( p, _document->ProcessEntities() );
1454 if ( !p || Attribute( attrib->Name() ) ) {
1455 DELETE_ATTRIBUTE( attrib );
1456 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING_ATTRIBUTE, start, p );
1457 return 0;
1458 }
1459 // There is a minor bug here: if the attribute in the source xml
1460 // document is duplicated, it will not be detected and the
1461 // attribute will be doubly added. However, tracking the 'prevAttribute'
1462 // avoids re-scanning the attribute list. Preferring performance for
1463 // now, may reconsider in the future.
1464 if ( prevAttribute ) {
1465 prevAttribute->_next = attrib;
1466 }
1467 else {
1468 _rootAttribute = attrib;
1469 }
1470 prevAttribute = attrib;
1471 }
1472 // end of the tag
1473 else if ( *p == '/' && *(p+1) == '>' ) {
1474 _closingType = CLOSED;
1475 return p+2; // done; sealed element.
1476 }
1477 // end of the tag
1478 else if ( *p == '>' ) {
1479 ++p;
1480 break;
1481 }
1482 else {
1483 _document->SetError( XML_ERROR_PARSING_ELEMENT, start, p );
1484 return 0;
1485 }
1486 }
1487 return p;
1488}
1489
1490
1491//
1492// <ele></ele>
1493// <ele>foo<b>bar</b></ele>
1494//
1495char* XMLElement::ParseDeep( char* p, StrPair* strPair )
1496{
1497 // Read the element name.
1498 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1499 if ( !p ) {
1500 return 0;
1501 }
1502
1503 // The closing element is the </element> form. It is
1504 // parsed just like a regular element then deleted from
1505 // the DOM.
1506 if ( *p == '/' ) {
1507 _closingType = CLOSING;
1508 ++p;
1509 }
1510
1511 p = _value.ParseName( p );
1512 if ( _value.Empty() ) {
1513 return 0;
1514 }
1515
1516 p = ParseAttributes( p );
1517 if ( !p || !*p || _closingType ) {
1518 return p;
1519 }
1520
1521 p = XMLNode::ParseDeep( p, strPair );
1522 return p;
1523}
1524
1525
1526
1527XMLNode* XMLElement::ShallowClone( XMLDocument* doc ) const
1528{
1529 if ( !doc ) {
1530 doc = _document;
1531 }
1532 XMLElement* element = doc->NewElement( Value() ); // fixme: this will always allocate memory. Intern?
1533 for( const XMLAttribute* a=FirstAttribute(); a; a=a->Next() ) {
1534 element->SetAttribute( a->Name(), a->Value() ); // fixme: this will always allocate memory. Intern?
1535 }
1536 return element;
1537}
1538
1539
1540bool XMLElement::ShallowEqual( const XMLNode* compare ) const
1541{
1542 const XMLElement* other = compare->ToElement();
1543 if ( other && XMLUtil::StringEqual( other->Value(), Value() )) {
1544
1545 const XMLAttribute* a=FirstAttribute();
1546 const XMLAttribute* b=other->FirstAttribute();
1547
1548 while ( a && b ) {
1549 if ( !XMLUtil::StringEqual( a->Value(), b->Value() ) ) {
1550 return false;
1551 }
1552 a = a->Next();
1553 b = b->Next();
1554 }
1555 if ( a || b ) {
1556 // different count
1557 return false;
1558 }
1559 return true;
1560 }
1561 return false;
1562}
1563
1564
1565bool XMLElement::Accept( XMLVisitor* visitor ) const
1566{
1567 if ( visitor->VisitEnter( *this, _rootAttribute ) ) {
1568 for ( const XMLNode* node=FirstChild(); node; node=node->NextSibling() ) {
1569 if ( !node->Accept( visitor ) ) {
1570 break;
1571 }
1572 }
1573 }
1574 return visitor->VisitExit( *this );
1575}
1576
1577
1578// --------- XMLDocument ----------- //
1579XMLDocument::XMLDocument( bool processEntities, Whitespace whitespace ) :
1580 XMLNode( 0 ),
1581 _writeBOM( false ),
1582 _processEntities( processEntities ),
1583 _errorID( XML_NO_ERROR ),
1584 _whitespace( whitespace ),
1585 _errorStr1( 0 ),
1586 _errorStr2( 0 ),
1587 _charBuffer( 0 )
1588{
1589 _document = this; // avoid warning about 'this' in initializer list
1590}
1591
1592
1593XMLDocument::~XMLDocument()
1594{
1595 DeleteChildren();
1596 delete [] _charBuffer;
1597
1598#if 0
1599 _textPool.Trace( "text" );
1600 _elementPool.Trace( "element" );
1601 _commentPool.Trace( "comment" );
1602 _attributePool.Trace( "attribute" );
1603#endif
1604
1605#ifdef DEBUG
1606 if ( Error() == false ) {
1607 TIXMLASSERT( _elementPool.CurrentAllocs() == _elementPool.Untracked() );
1608 TIXMLASSERT( _attributePool.CurrentAllocs() == _attributePool.Untracked() );
1609 TIXMLASSERT( _textPool.CurrentAllocs() == _textPool.Untracked() );
1610 TIXMLASSERT( _commentPool.CurrentAllocs() == _commentPool.Untracked() );
1611 }
1612#endif
1613}
1614
1615
1616void XMLDocument::Clear()
1617{
1618 DeleteChildren();
1619
1620 _errorID = XML_NO_ERROR;
1621 _errorStr1 = 0;
1622 _errorStr2 = 0;
1623
1624 delete [] _charBuffer;
1625 _charBuffer = 0;
1626}
1627
1628
1629XMLElement* XMLDocument::NewElement( const char* name )
1630{
1631 XMLElement* ele = new (_elementPool.Alloc()) XMLElement( this );
1632 ele->_memPool = &_elementPool;
1633 ele->SetName( name );
1634 return ele;
1635}
1636
1637
1638XMLComment* XMLDocument::NewComment( const char* str )
1639{
1640 XMLComment* comment = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLComment( this );
1641 comment->_memPool = &_commentPool;
1642 comment->SetValue( str );
1643 return comment;
1644}
1645
1646
1647XMLText* XMLDocument::NewText( const char* str )
1648{
1649 XMLText* text = new (_textPool.Alloc()) XMLText( this );
1650 text->_memPool = &_textPool;
1651 text->SetValue( str );
1652 return text;
1653}
1654
1655
1656XMLDeclaration* XMLDocument::NewDeclaration( const char* str )
1657{
1658 XMLDeclaration* dec = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLDeclaration( this );
1659 dec->_memPool = &_commentPool;
1660 dec->SetValue( str ? str : "xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"" );
1661 return dec;
1662}
1663
1664
1665XMLUnknown* XMLDocument::NewUnknown( const char* str )
1666{
1667 XMLUnknown* unk = new (_commentPool.Alloc()) XMLUnknown( this );
1668 unk->_memPool = &_commentPool;
1669 unk->SetValue( str );
1670 return unk;
1671}
1672
1673static FILE* callfopen( const char* filepath, const char* mode )
1674{
1675#if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1400 ) && (!defined WINCE)
1676 FILE* fp = 0;
1677 errno_t err = fopen_s( &fp, filepath, mode );
1678 if ( err ) {
1679 return 0;
1680 }
1681#else
1682 FILE* fp = fopen( filepath, mode );
1683#endif
1684 return fp;
1685}
1686
1687XMLError XMLDocument::LoadFile( const char* filename )
1688{
1689 Clear();
1690 FILE* fp = callfopen( filename, "rb" );
1691 if ( !fp ) {
1692 SetError( XML_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND, filename, 0 );
1693 return _errorID;
1694 }
1695 LoadFile( fp );
1696 fclose( fp );
1697 return _errorID;
1698}
1699
1700
1701XMLError XMLDocument::LoadFile( FILE* fp )
1702{
1703 Clear();
1704
1705 fseek( fp, 0, SEEK_SET );
1706 if ( fgetc( fp ) == EOF && ferror( fp ) != 0 ) {
1707 SetError( XML_ERROR_FILE_READ_ERROR, 0, 0 );
1708 return _errorID;
1709 }
1710
1711 fseek( fp, 0, SEEK_END );
1712 const long filelength = ftell( fp );
1713 fseek( fp, 0, SEEK_SET );
1714 if ( filelength == -1L ) {
1715 SetError( XML_ERROR_FILE_READ_ERROR, 0, 0 );
1716 return _errorID;
1717 }
1718
1719 const size_t size = filelength;
1720 if ( size == 0 ) {
1721 SetError( XML_ERROR_EMPTY_DOCUMENT, 0, 0 );
1722 return _errorID;
1723 }
1724
1725 _charBuffer = new char[size+1];
1726 size_t read = fread( _charBuffer, 1, size, fp );
1727 if ( read != size ) {
1728 SetError( XML_ERROR_FILE_READ_ERROR, 0, 0 );
1729 return _errorID;
1730 }
1731
1732 _charBuffer[size] = 0;
1733
1734 const char* p = _charBuffer;
1735 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1736 p = XMLUtil::ReadBOM( p, &_writeBOM );
1737 if ( !p || !*p ) {
1738 SetError( XML_ERROR_EMPTY_DOCUMENT, 0, 0 );
1739 return _errorID;
1740 }
1741
1742 ParseDeep( _charBuffer + (p-_charBuffer), 0 );
1743 return _errorID;
1744}
1745
1746
1747XMLError XMLDocument::SaveFile( const char* filename, bool compact )
1748{
1749 FILE* fp = callfopen( filename, "w" );
1750 if ( !fp ) {
1751 SetError( XML_ERROR_FILE_COULD_NOT_BE_OPENED, filename, 0 );
1752 return _errorID;
1753 }
1754 SaveFile(fp, compact);
1755 fclose( fp );
1756 return _errorID;
1757}
1758
1759
1760XMLError XMLDocument::SaveFile( FILE* fp, bool compact )
1761{
1762 XMLPrinter stream( fp, compact );
1763 Print( &stream );
1764 return _errorID;
1765}
1766
1767
1768XMLError XMLDocument::Parse( const char* p, size_t len )
1769{
1770 const char* start = p;
1771 Clear();
1772
1773 if ( len == 0 || !p || !*p ) {
1774 SetError( XML_ERROR_EMPTY_DOCUMENT, 0, 0 );
1775 return _errorID;
1776 }
1777 if ( len == (size_t)(-1) ) {
1778 len = strlen( p );
1779 }
1780 _charBuffer = new char[ len+1 ];
1781 memcpy( _charBuffer, p, len );
1782 _charBuffer[len] = 0;
1783
1784 p = XMLUtil::SkipWhiteSpace( p );
1785 p = XMLUtil::ReadBOM( p, &_writeBOM );
1786 if ( !p || !*p ) {
1787 SetError( XML_ERROR_EMPTY_DOCUMENT, 0, 0 );
1788 return _errorID;
1789 }
1790
1791 ptrdiff_t delta = p - start; // skip initial whitespace, BOM, etc.
1792 ParseDeep( _charBuffer+delta, 0 );
1793 return _errorID;
1794}
1795
1796
1797void XMLDocument::Print( XMLPrinter* streamer ) const
1798{
1799 XMLPrinter stdStreamer( stdout );
1800 if ( !streamer ) {
1801 streamer = &stdStreamer;
1802 }
1803 Accept( streamer );
1804}

1806
1807void XMLDocument::SetError( XMLError error, const char* str1, const char* str2 )
1808{
1809 _errorID = error;
1810 _errorStr1 = str1;
1811 _errorStr2 = str2;
1812}
1813
1814
1815void XMLDocument::PrintError() const
1816{
1817 if ( _errorID ) {
1818 static const int LEN = 20;
1819 char buf1[LEN] = { 0 };
1820 char buf2[LEN] = { 0 };
1821
1822 if ( _errorStr1 ) {
1823 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buf1, LEN, "%s", _errorStr1 );
1824 }
1825 if ( _errorStr2 ) {
1826 TIXML_SNPRINTF( buf2, LEN, "%s", _errorStr2 );
1827 }
1828
1829 printf( "XMLDocument error id=%d str1=%s str2=%s\n",
1830 _errorID, buf1, buf2 );
1831 }
1832}
1833
1834
1835XMLPrinter::XMLPrinter( FILE* file, bool compact, int depth ) :
1836 _elementJustOpened( false ),
1837 _firstElement( true ),
1838 _fp( file ),
1839 _depth( depth ),
1840 _textDepth( -1 ),
1841 _processEntities( true ),
1842 _compactMode( compact )
1843{
1844 for( int i=0; i<ENTITY_RANGE; ++i ) {
1845 _entityFlag[i] = false;
1846 _restrictedEntityFlag[i] = false;
1847 }
1848 for( int i=0; i<NUM_ENTITIES; ++i ) {
1849 TIXMLASSERT( entities[i].value < ENTITY_RANGE );
1850 if ( entities[i].value < ENTITY_RANGE ) {
1851 _entityFlag[ (int)entities[i].value ] = true;
1852 }
1853 }
1854 _restrictedEntityFlag[(int)'&'] = true;
1855 _restrictedEntityFlag[(int)'<'] = true;
1856 _restrictedEntityFlag[(int)'>'] = true; // not required, but consistency is nice
1857 _buffer.Push( 0 );
1858}
1859
1860
1861void XMLPrinter::Print( const char* format, ... )
1862{
1863 va_list va;
1864 va_start( va, format );
1865
1866 if ( _fp ) {
1867 vfprintf( _fp, format, va );
1868 }
1869 else {
1870#if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1400 )
1871 #if defined(WINCE)
1872 int len = 512;
1873 do {
1874 len = len*2;
1875 char* str = new char[len]();
1876 len = _vsnprintf(str, len, format, va);
1877 delete[] str;
1878 }while (len < 0);
1879 #else
1880 int len = _vscprintf( format, va );
1881 #endif
1882#else
1883 int len = vsnprintf( 0, 0, format, va );
1884#endif
1885 // Close out and re-start the va-args
1886 va_end( va );
1887 va_start( va, format );
1888 char* p = _buffer.PushArr( len ) - 1; // back up over the null terminator.
1889#if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1400 )
1890 #if defined(WINCE)
1891 _vsnprintf( p, len+1, format, va );
1892 #else
1893 vsnprintf_s( p, len+1, _TRUNCATE, format, va );
1894 #endif
1895#else
1896 vsnprintf( p, len+1, format, va );
1897#endif
1898 }
1899 va_end( va );
1900}
1901
1902
1903void XMLPrinter::PrintSpace( int depth )
1904{
1905 for( int i=0; i<depth; ++i ) {
1906 Print( " " );
1907 }
1908}
1909
1910
1911void XMLPrinter::PrintString( const char* p, bool restricted )
1912{
1913 // Look for runs of bytes between entities to print.
1914 const char* q = p;
1915 const bool* flag = restricted ? _restrictedEntityFlag : _entityFlag;
1916
1917 if ( _processEntities ) {
1918 while ( *q ) {
1919 // Remember, char is sometimes signed. (How many times has that bitten me?)
1920 if ( *q > 0 && *q < ENTITY_RANGE ) {
1921 // Check for entities. If one is found, flush
1922 // the stream up until the entity, write the
1923 // entity, and keep looking.
1924 if ( flag[(unsigned)(*q)] ) {
1925 while ( p < q ) {
1926 Print( "%c", *p );
1927 ++p;
1928 }
1929 for( int i=0; i<NUM_ENTITIES; ++i ) {
1930 if ( entities[i].value == *q ) {
1931 Print( "&%s;", entities[i].pattern );
1932 break;
1933 }
1934 }
1935 ++p;
1936 }
1937 }
1938 ++q;
1939 }
1940 }
1941 // Flush the remaining string. This will be the entire
1942 // string if an entity wasn't found.
1943 if ( !_processEntities || (q-p > 0) ) {
1944 Print( "%s", p );
1945 }
1946}
1947
1948
1949void XMLPrinter::PushHeader( bool writeBOM, bool writeDec )
1950{
1951 if ( writeBOM ) {
1952 static const unsigned char bom[] = { TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0, TIXML_UTF_LEAD_1, TIXML_UTF_LEAD_2, 0 };
1953 Print( "%s", bom );
1954 }
1955 if ( writeDec ) {
1956 PushDeclaration( "xml version=\"1.0\"" );
1957 }
1958}
1959
1960
1961void XMLPrinter::OpenElement( const char* name, bool compactMode )
1962{
1963 if ( _elementJustOpened ) {
1964 SealElement();
1965 }
1966 _stack.Push( name );
1967
1968 if ( _textDepth < 0 && !_firstElement && !compactMode ) {
1969 Print( "\n" );
1970 }
1971 if ( !compactMode ) {
1972 PrintSpace( _depth );
1973 }
1974
1975 Print( "<%s", name );
1976 _elementJustOpened = true;
1977 _firstElement = false;
1978 ++_depth;
1979}
1980
1981
1982void XMLPrinter::PushAttribute( const char* name, const char* value )
1983{
1984 TIXMLASSERT( _elementJustOpened );
1985 Print( " %s=\"", name );
1986 PrintString( value, false );
1987 Print( "\"" );
1988}

1992{

1994 XMLUtil::ToStr( v, buf, BUF_SIZE );
1995 PushAttribute( name, buf );
1996}

2021
2022
2023void XMLPrinter::CloseElement( bool compactMode )
2024{
2025 --_depth;
2026 const char* name = _stack.Pop();
2027
2028 if ( _elementJustOpened ) {
2029 Print( "/>" );
2030 }
2031 else {
2032 if ( _textDepth < 0 && !compactMode) {
2033 Print( "\n" );
2034 PrintSpace( _depth );
2035 }
2036 Print( "</%s>", name );
2037 }
2038
2039 if ( _textDepth == _depth ) {
2040 _textDepth = -1;
2041 }
2042 if ( _depth == 0 && !compactMode) {
2043 Print( "\n" );
2044 }
2045 _elementJustOpened = false;
2046}
2047
2048
2049void XMLPrinter::SealElement()
2050{
2051 _elementJustOpened = false;
2052 Print( ">" );
2053}
2054
2055
2056void XMLPrinter::PushText( const char* text, bool cdata )
2057{
2058 _textDepth = _depth-1;
2059
2060 if ( _elementJustOpened ) {
2061 SealElement();
2062 }
2063 if ( cdata ) {
2064 Print( "<![CDATA[" );
2065 Print( "%s", text );
2066 Print( "]]>" );
2067 }
2068 else {
2069 PrintString( text, true );
2070 }
2071}

2076 XMLUtil::ToStr( value, buf, BUF_SIZE );
2077 PushText( buf, false );
2078}

2113void XMLPrinter::PushComment( const char* comment )
2114{
2115 if ( _elementJustOpened ) {
2116 SealElement();
2117 }
2118 if ( _textDepth < 0 && !_firstElement && !_compactMode) {
2119 Print( "\n" );
2120 PrintSpace( _depth );
2121 }
2122 _firstElement = false;
2123 Print( "<!--%s-->", comment );
2124}

2130 SealElement();
2131 }
2132 if ( _textDepth < 0 && !_firstElement && !_compactMode) {
2133 Print( "\n" );
2134 PrintSpace( _depth );
2135 }
2136 _firstElement = false;
2137 Print( "<?%s?>", value );
2138}

2141void XMLPrinter::PushUnknown( const char* value )
2142{
2143 if ( _elementJustOpened ) {
2144 SealElement();
2145 }
2146 if ( _textDepth < 0 && !_firstElement && !_compactMode) {
2147 Print( "\n" );
2148 PrintSpace( _depth );
2149 }
2150 _firstElement = false;
2151 Print( "<!%s>", value );
2152}

2154
2155bool XMLPrinter::VisitEnter( const XMLDocument& doc )
2156{
2157 _processEntities = doc.ProcessEntities();
2158 if ( doc.HasBOM() ) {
2159 PushHeader( true, false );
2160 }
2161 return true;
2162}
2163
2164
2165bool XMLPrinter::VisitEnter( const XMLElement& element, const XMLAttribute* attribute )
2166{
2167 const XMLElement* parentElem = element.Parent()->ToElement();
2168 bool compactMode = parentElem ? CompactMode(*parentElem) : _compactMode;
2169 OpenElement( element.Name(), compactMode );
2170 while ( attribute ) {
2171 PushAttribute( attribute->Name(), attribute->Value() );
2172 attribute = attribute->Next();
2173 }
2174 return true;
2175}
2176
2177
2178bool XMLPrinter::VisitExit( const XMLElement& element )
2179{
2180 CloseElement( CompactMode(element) );
2181 return true;
2182}
2183
2184
2185bool XMLPrinter::Visit( const XMLText& text )
2186{
2187 PushText( text.Value(), text.CData() );
2188 return true;
2189}
2190
2191
2192bool XMLPrinter::Visit( const XMLComment& comment )
2193{
2194 PushComment( comment.Value() );
2195 return true;
2196}
2197
2198bool XMLPrinter::Visit( const XMLDeclaration& declaration )
2199{
2200 PushDeclaration( declaration.Value() );
2201 return true;
2202}
2203
2204
2205bool XMLPrinter::Visit( const XMLUnknown& unknown )
2206{
2207 PushUnknown( unknown.Value() );
2208 return true;
2209}
